column2: SELECT   p.ra,   p.dec,   z.z,   z.zErr,   p.petroMag_r  FROM PhotoObj p   -- galaxies nearby ra = # and dec = #. This target galaxy has a redshift of z = #, so # Mpc corresponds to # arcmin at this distance   JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq(#,#,#) n ON n.objID = p.objID   JOIN Photoz z ON z.objID = n.objID  WHERE   p.type = #   AND z.z < # + #*z.zErr   AND z.z > # - #*z.zErr   AND z.zErr < #*z.z
